DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety LEO 80185 gel Dovobet® ointment treatment psoriasis Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: LEO 80185 Gel ( Calcipotriol Hydrate Plus Betamethasone Dipropionate ) Japanese Subjects With Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: A phase 3 , national , multi-centre , 4-week , prospective , randomise , control , parallel-group , open trial LEO 80185 gel versus Dovobet® ointment Japanese subject psoriasis vulgaris .
